about_the_game:
Tidebound is a game that seamlessly blends the tranquility of fishing with the strategic depth of inventory management, offering a serene yet engaging gaming experience. At its heart, Tidebound is a farming simulator, where players immerse themselves in agricultural activities, creature collection, and effective resource management.

Gameplay


Inventory management is a critical aspect of gameplay. Players must efficiently manage the resources they gather, whether from the sea, their farms, or during their explorations. Balancing storage space, deciding which resources to keep, sell, or use, and upgrading equipment are all strategic decisions that affect progress in the game.

Chill & Engaging Atmosphere


Despite its depth, Tidebound maintains a relaxing and casual atmosphere. It's designed to be accessible to players who prefer a more laid-back gaming experience, yet it still offers enough complexity and challenge to keep more seasoned gamers engaged.

In summary, Tidebound is a rich and varied experience, offering players a unique blend of activities and challenges. Whether you're a fan of meticulous resource management, the calmness of fishing, the satisfaction of a well-tended farm, or the thrill of discovery, Tidebound caters to a wide range of gaming preferences, all set in a captivating and serene world.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04, SteamOS
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8 or higher, ATI X1600 or higher, or Intel HD 3000 or higher
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL Compatible Sound Card
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ Desktop only, SteamOS
  • Processor: Dual-core 2Ghz CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8 or higher, ATI X1600 or higher, or Intel HD 3000 or higher
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL Compatible Sound Card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6 or above
  • Processor: Apple Silicon M1 (M2 and M3) or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720 minimum resolution, OpenGL 2.0 Support, and recommended dedicated graphics card with 128 MB of RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: M1, M2, M3 Silicon Mac & ARM Supported
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9.1 (Mid 2022+)
  • Processor: Apple Silicon M1 (Runs smooth)
  • Graphics: 2560 x 1600 Runs good with High settings
  • Sound Card: OpenAL Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: M1, M2, M3 Silicon Mac & ARM Supported

short_description: Tidebound is a fishing and inventory management game with a relaxing, casual atmosphere. Catch, sell, upgrade your boat, and sail further to catch more expensive and exotic sea animals. Casual yet engaging, the game offers a sense of progress with tons of equipment and hundreds of species to catch.
